titles.title: How Good And Pleasant It Is

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How good and pleasant it is
For brethren to dwell together in unity!
It's like the anointing oil so rich and rare,
This dwelling in unity.
It's like the dew on Mt. Hermon
Falling fresh on you and me.
Oh, how good it is,
How pleasant it is to dwell in unity.
